get.description: API fetches all kb sections under the given root category

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: Visibility of the category. Values allowed are !@AGENTS@!, !@GROUP_USERS@!, !@ALL_USERS@!,!@NONE@!

schema.description: Visibility of the category. Values allowed are !@AGENTS@!, !@GROUP_USERS@!, !@ALL_USERS@!,!@NONE@!

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of sections to return. Default value will be 30

schema.description: Number of sections to return. Default value will be 30

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort order of the categories. Allowed values : !@name,@! !@order@!

schema.description: Sort order of the categories. Allowed values : !@name,@! !@order@!

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Offset value. Default value will be 1

schema.description: Offset value. Default value will be 1

parameters.name: parentCategoryId
parameters.description: To fetch sections under given parent categoryId

schema.description: To fetch sections under given parent categoryId

visibility.description: Visibility of the section. Values allowed are !@AGENTS@!, !@GROUP_USERS@!, !@ALL_USERS@!,!@NONE@!,!@PRIVATE_IP@!

translations.name: Systematic analysis

locale.name: locale
locale.description: Locale of the kb section translation. If no locale is given, all the locale translations will be returned

parentCategoryId.description: Parent id (either section or rootCategoryId) below which we need to create a section

targetCategoryId.description: Category Id to which articles need to be moved
